>
[Polarizing Mace](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1875)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 34 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 950 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Light Mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

Even grasping the amber handle of this +1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [shock](/Equipment.aspx?ID=303) [light mace](/Weapons.aspx?ID=5) makes your hair stand on end.

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=561), [manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=645)) **Frequency** once per day;  **Requirements** The wielder of a _[grounding spike](/Equipment.aspx?ID=1874)_ is within 30 feet; **Effect** A great surge of electricity connects your paired weapons. All creatures in a line between you and the wielder of the _grounding spike_ take 4d12 electricity damage (DC 24 [basic](/Rules.aspx?ID=329) Reflex save).

**Special** The _polarizing mace_ pairs with the _grounding spike_.

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Polarizing Mace
